# Blindsense (Advanced Talent)
## Overview
*Blindsense (Ex):* A rogue with this talent gains blindsense to a range of 30 feet. A rogue must have the [[Blind-Fight (Feat)|Blind-Fight]] feat and be at least 10th level before selecting this talent.

**Source:** Legendary Rogues (Legendary Games), pg. 9
